title: SIP 04: Creation of Method of Exchange token for Stimmy Network
body:
Summary:

Creation of a new asset to be the Method of Exchange for the Stimmy Network.

Abstract:

The objective of this proposal is to establish a new token as the Method of Exchange for securing AaaS services for future projects that desire to utilize the Stimmy Network.

Because additional STMY will not be created, this new token could have inflationary characteristics that allow long-term farming potential as well as burn mechanisms when used for creating AaaS contracts.


Motivation

Jobe created the initial STMY token for the DAO but there is a limited supply in circulation and future participants utilization could decrease the circulating supply from this total, a proposal for a new instrument is vital.

As the first SIP from a non-core address, our hopes are that this will help push development and expectations from the DAO participants to be established.

Providing a portion of the new tokens to present STMY holders can be an excellent beta token test for the AaaS platform being created, and may help iterate the lessons learned into the final Mainnet release of the Stimmy Network.

Having the DAO build the new token and upon inspection being created and released by the Developers into a beta platform test will allow the token to be officially backed as a component of future Stimmy releases.


Specification

Upon approval, a new token, named Fiat (FIAT) will be released via the platform. 50% of the supply will be divided amongst all STMY holders that meet the threshold of 600 STMY minimum as outlined in SIP 02. Of the remaining 50%, 

40% will be divided among the top 250 holders of 8 Ethereum projects, to be determined by SIP Snapshot votes from all STMY holders that meet the minimum governance threshold of 2000 STMY. 

The remaining 10% of Fiat (FIAT) tokens will be divided amongst two addresses, One held by the STMY Contract Creation Address (0x4778a020C6Ef7A433f7f69F5A679Bba7669bE432) to be used for future STMY/FIAT development, or liquidity provision,

And a second to reward the contract creators of FIAT. 7.5% will be distributed to the Contract Creation Address, and 2.5% will be distributed to the contract creators.

As there are 6,900,000 total STMY, this proposal suggests an initial 100:1 creation of FIAT (690,000,000), and a maximum supply of 2,000,000,000 FIAT via to be determined yield farming proposals. 

With the above, we can achieve:

    Creation of an asset that rewards STMY holders
    Establish long-term yield farming prospect for Stimmy Network
    Increase STMY liquidity

Implementation

Members of the Stimmy DAO will assist in creation of the FIAT contract with a release to be distributed within 60 days from the close of this proposal. 

This will enable the DAO to distribute the FIAT reward via a Stimmy Network platform beta, and avoid using the “multisender.app” method previously used. This will both:

    Avoid the higher costs of gas
    Allow claimants unlimited time to access their rewards
author: 0xE3C7e0207e03C4150CF5155A0F1Cdbaf38246e70
